decision_conditions: The proposed development (modifications) shall be completed to the Council's satisfaction within 6 months of the date of this permission, otherwise the planning permission will lapse.

Reason: To comply with the terms of this planning permission and to ensure that the development does not detract from the character of the site and the Conservation Area in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) and the Hanger Hill (Haymills) Conservation Area Management Plan (2008).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Site Location Plan; A-EG-101C-BP-002; A-EG-101C-PL-100; A-EG-101C-PL-110; A-EG-101C-EL-300.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials and detailing of the windows (including opening style, colour, rebate, frame thickness and finer detailing) to be used in the development shall be as per the submitted application form or approved drawings and supporting documents (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18), policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - sections 12 and 16.
description: Retention of three front elevation windows and replacement of existing ground and first floor bay windows (front elevation; in a modified form)
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
